ProjectTitle: Acoustic beamforming based on auditory attention decoding
InitialFeedbackHistory:
29/06/2022
6. Preservation: Please note that the preservation period for data related to clinical studies is now 25 years, this is mandatory for clinical trails and recommended for all other clinical studies. 
7. Sharing: Towards the end of your study you can LRD if there is valorization potential or else onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be to discuss whether your data is suitable for sharing. You can consider using RDR: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr where you can apply embargo or restrict access if needed.
